content.text: I'm going to plant some sunflower seeds with my siblings, which reminds me of all the happy times we had together.
I'm wearing my new sweater while taking my dog for a walk.
That sounds nice, what kind of dog do you have?
A golden retriever named Buddy.
Oh how cute! I have two cats, a tabby named Mittens and an orange tabby named Oliver.
Aww, I love cats! I've never had one, but I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're great companions.
Maybe I will someday.
I also like to sing in my room when no one is around.
That's cool! I like to sing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, me neither! But it's still fun to do.
Yeah, it is.
What are you doing today?
I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz, where I was accepted.
Oh, that's great! What are you going to study there?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business.
That's a good choice. Business is a great field to go into.
Thanks!
Have fun at school!
Thanks, I will!
